members.signatureBeforeChange: int callPaintEventHandler (int control, int damageRgn, int visibleRgn, int theEvent, int nextHandler)
members.signatureAfterChange: int callPaintEventHandler (int control, int damageRgn, int visibleRgn, int theEvent, int nextHandler)
diff: +	* Feature in the Macintosh.  The draw item proc is not called if the column width
+	* is zero. This means that the SWT.MeasureItem listener is not called and the column
+	* does not get wider ever.  The fix is to change the column width to one.

members.signatureBeforeChange: int callPaintEventHandler (int control, int damageRgn, int visibleRgn, int theEvent, int nextHandler)
members.signatureAfterChange: int callPaintEventHandler (int control, int damageRgn, int visibleRgn, int theEvent, int nextHandler)
diff: +	* Feature in the Macintosh.  The draw item proc is not called if the column width
+	* is zero. This means that the SWT.MeasureItem listener is not called and the column
+	* does not get wider ever.  The fix is to change the column width to one.
